meanings.definition: Not planned or prepared in advance.
meanings.sent1: The unplanned picnic was a fun surprise.
meanings.sent2: She made an unplanned visit to her friend's house.
meanings.sent3: The unplanned rain shower caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: His unplanned decision to take a different route led to a beautiful discovery.
meanings.sent5: The unplanned party turned out to be the highlight of the week.

meanings.definition: Happening without prior arrangement or intention.
meanings.sent1: The unplanned meeting with her favorite author left her speechless.
meanings.sent2: They took an unplanned road trip and had a great adventure.
meanings.sent3: The unplanned arrival of the puppies brought joy to the whole family.
meanings.sent4: His unplanned absence from the meeting caused some confusion.
meanings.sent5: The unplanned fireworks display lit up the night sky unexpectedly.
